name: Winter Fall
description:
Relaxing winter-themed 2d collecting game. 

The goal is to collect the requested combination and the faster it is collected the better the score is.

Try to be in the top 10 players.

If you need a break from all the noise I hope this calm game will help you there.

https://twitter.com/EnBojan

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first published game. If you have any suggestions for additional features I may consider them and create a mobile version of the game.

If you liked the game enough, please consider supporting the game.
